protein.specific_function: Synthesizes selenophosphate from selenide and ATP.

reference.reference_text: Low SC, Harney JW, Berry MJ: Cloning and functional characterization of human selenophosphate synthetase, an essential component of selenoprotein synthesis. J Biol Chem. 1995 Sep 15;270(37):21659-64.
